title: Christmas spiced fruit cake
ingredients: ['450g glace cherries', '225g cut mixed peel', '300g raisins', '150g currants', '150g dates, pitted and chopped', '125g blanched flaked almonds', '125ml brandy', '60g plain flour', '250g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '225g butter', '450g dark brown soft sugar', '6 eggs', '275g treacle', '185ml apple juice']
